feat.value: He said, that is Abba Isaac:
“Our fathers and Abba Pambo would wear tunics of rags in pieces and tunics of palm fiber,
but you now you wear adorned tunics.
Go from this place, you have ruined it.
Then as they were about to go to the harvest he said to them:
“I’m not going to repeat and give you an order again,
after all, you don’t observe them.”
